Author: GN Compass
Title: [ANN - TOKEN SALE] GN Compass - Cryptocurrency-Backed Lending Platform
Body: No, we are definitely not like Ethlend or SALT. Those guys offer collateral loans meaning, the borrower has to put up collateral i.e their ETH, Bitcoin ETC. in order to borrow on these platforms. We don't require that. We will compete easily because we have a better product and business than these guys.  Please read our latest Medium post about why our platform is better than the competitions: https://medium.com/@michaeltcnorth/the-difference-between-gn-compass-and-other-crypto-lending-platforms-d933a67701b6  Thank you!

Author: GN Compass
Title: [ANN - TOKEN SALE] GN Compass - Cryptocurrency-Backed Lending Platform
Body: Greetings to our dear investors and supporters,   The founding team and I have decided to momentarily pause our main sale and postpone it to April 9th, 2018.   The decision was made due to a combination of factors which we believe will result in GN Compass having an incredibly successful token sale. Throughout March, founding members will be flying around Europe holding meetings for private token sale and equity investors. We will also be meeting with Attila Szupinger of Perfect International Services (https://www.piscapital.com) in Switzerland, in order to finalize our $140 million collateral bond backing the GNCT.   During this time, we will also be finalizing our listing and partnership on Bancor's decentralized liquidity protocol.   Throughout March, the bounty campaign and airdrop promotional efforts will continue which means that supporters of GN Compass can continue to earn free GNCT in exchange for promoting our project! Be sure to visit https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2708667.0 to participate in the Bounty Campaign.   Due to these factors, our efforts throughout March will be on securing deals and partnerships which ensure that GN Compass reaches its full potential. The main sale will resume April 9th, 2018.   Thanks for your support,   Michael Collins Co-founder & CEO, GN Compass

Author: GN Compass
Title: [ANN - TOKEN SALE] GN Compass - Cryptocurrency-Backed Lending Platform
Body: Hi, Thank you for your input. If the ICO fails (which is very unlikely as we have over half a million is sales and commitments) we will still develop the platform. In fact our CTO Jordan Tymburski has already started the front-end development. We are also speaking to VC's and Angels about this project and should get investments from these sources as well.  With regards to the value of the token, we have signed a $140 million USD collateral bond that will back the company and the tokens so your investments are completely protected. The bond will be under the entity GN Compass collateral corporation that we will be creating. The portfolio will be held in our trust in Switzerland.  It is completely unfortunate what is going on in the industry with all these scams, its sickening actually, and I understand where you are coming from, it certainly makes it tough for us legitimate businesses to get people to back our campaign but we will keep going because we are on a mission.  As for our marketing, we didn't start out with a huge marketing budget like many other ICO's because we actually have other costs we have to consider as this is an actual functioning startup company with employees, a location, overhead etc. We are not some guys in a basement somewhere, so we had to be more targeted with our marketing and not noisy or all over the place. As more funds become available we will invest more in marketing.  I hope this helps. Thank you.

Author: zoonosis
Title: [ANN - TOKEN SALE] GN Compass - Cryptocurrency-Backed Lending Platform
Body: GN COMPASS Peer-to-peer Cryptocurrency-Backed Lending platform for peace of mind, worry free investing   WEBSITE / WHITE PAPER / TELEGRAM / TWITTER / FACEBOOK / MEDIUM / REDDIT / SLACK  Official GN Compass Bounty campaign: 10,000,000 GNCT Tokens (~$3,000,000 USD) are waiting for you! https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2708667.0  ======================================== ICO CAPS  Softcap: $500,000 USD (achieved) Hardcap: $14,000,000 USD   TOKEN SALE: 29.01 - 30.04  Pre-Sale 1st  Round: 29.01 â€“ 04.02 | 1 GNCT = $0.14 USD Pre-Sale 2nd Round: 05.02 â€“ 11.02 | 1 GNCT = $0.20 USD Pre-Sale 3rd Round: 12.02 â€“ 28.02 | 1 GNCT = $0.25 USD Main-Sale : 09.04 - 30.04 | 1 GNCT = $0.30 USD ======================================== Other Languages (Links will be updated after the translation) ------------------ . â€¢ Korean : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Indonesian : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Dutch : (ANNANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Thai : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Polish : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Filipino : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Japanese : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Vietnamese : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Italian : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Danish : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Russian : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Arabic : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Spanish : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Romanian : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Bulgarian : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Greek : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Turkish : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Ukrainian : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ German : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Portuguese : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Slovenian : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Hindi : (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ French: (ANN, Whitepaper) â€¢ Chinese Simplified : (ANN, Whitepaper)  PROBLEMS ______________   Even with the internet and modern technology, loans remain very similar to their origins with big banks and gate keepers leveraging majority of the value.  This causes three large issues within the modern-day loan industry:    1.   Centralized structures that lack transparency;    2.   Low liquidity of notes and securities;    3.   One-dimensional credit scores that only aggregates and analyzes public consumer data.   SOLUTIONS ______________   GN Compass provides Cryptocurrency-Backed Loansâ„¢ to create constant liquidity in the lending market. This is accomplished by allowing investors to sell portions of loans in their portfolio. Investors are not locked in to the term of a loan and can liquidate loans for any reason (E.g. financial hardship, increased GNCT price etc.) only after a certain no-trade time period has been reached.  The buying investors will reap the benefit of the loans being paid back by borrowers while the selling investor still makes a profit. By using blockchain technology to verify and distribute all transactions across the Ethereum network, it guarantees transparency.   HOW IT WORKS ______________   For Lenders Investors simply sign up and create their profile and investment portfolio. The investment portfolio page will ask the Investor about their investment goals such as retirement planning, preferred repayment cycle (e.g. To have investment re payments deposited to their account on a certain day per month). This is where they will input the amount they are looking to invest and the interest rate they are looking to receive plus the length of time they are looking to invest for.  Once the profile is complete and the Investor is happy with their investment settings, they will then be required to add their banking information into our secure payment system. From there, the Investor will be assigned a secure digital wallet attached to their bank account where all the transfers and payments will be made. The Investor investments will then be sent to a loan pool to fund loans. When loans are being repaid the GNCT backing the loans will be adjusted accordingly.   For Borrowers Borrowers will sign up by creating a username, password and completing a profile page. They will also have the option to sign up using their Facebook account, which will enable GN Compass to connect and pull basic information from their Facebook profile.  Once the Borrower has successfully completed their profile and all required documents have been submitted and processed, a risk assessment will be done and the borrower willbe given a risk rating. The loan amounts will range from $1,000.00 to a maximum of $50,000.00 with an interest rate from 3.99% to 11.99%. If their risk rating is within our parameters, they can proceed with their application. If their risk rating is beyond our parameters, they will be declined and required to reapply in three months.  Approved borrowers will fill out a loan application (aka smart contract), which will ask how much they want to borrow, loan length (e.g. six months, one year, three years etc.) and loan repayment cycle (e.g. to have automatic withdrawals from their account on a certain day per month). Loan requests will be sent to a pool of other loan requests with the same credit rating where Investors' funds will fund the loans.  Borrowers are required to pay balance protection insurance on loans. The insurance amount is a percentage of the outstanding balance. The percentage is determined by the borrower's risk rating.   GN Compass Credit System Our credit system will use traditional credit scores, mobile data and social media analytics to assess risk and assign a GN Compass credit rating from A+ to B. Other factors assessed to determine a borrowers GN Compass credit rating will be occupation, military service, volunteer work, credit history, debt-to-income ratio and income. This information will give us more detailed picture of our borrowers.  Microloans In the future, we wil offer micro loans to higher risk borrowers. These borrowers will be assigned a GN Compass credit rating of C+ to D, and receive loans from $150 to $1000 at interest rates from 13.99% to 16.99%. These borrowers wil also have the opportunity to improve their credit rating with good payment history.  Compass Token (GNCT) Al loans will be backed by Compass tokens (GNCT). The tokens wil represent the amount invested. This does not include the potential interest amount the Investors wil receive. If Borrowers default on a loan over a certain period, the tokens will be automatically exchanged and the fiat currency the Investor originally invested with (e.g. US dollars) will be deposited into the Investors' walet. The Investor can then choose to reinvest or transfer funds from their wallets back into their bank accounts.  Transferability of Tokens What makes GN Compass unique is that Investors can sell loan portions or their entire loan portfolio to another person.  If an Investor wants to sell a portion on their loan to a new buyer(s), their information will be attached to the smart contract along with the Sellers. The percentage of the tokens sold will determine the percentage of the investment and interest that will be divided among the seller and buyer(s).  If the seller sells all their tokens, the smart contract will replace the seller's information for the buyers, and all the proceeds of the seller's former investment (plus interest) will go to the new buyer(s). The new buyer(s) would have to be registered as a token buyer or an Investor on our system and have a wallet with us.   Introduction Video   ADVANTAGES ______________   .  Borrowers are funded 10x faster than banks  Borrowers and Investors don't need to own cryptocurrency  Investors funds are backed by GNCT which are much more liquid than notes and securities .  Our cryptocurrency-Backed Loansâ„¢ secure Investors fund with GNCT so Investors have zero risks  Easy to sign up. easy to apply for loans and easy to invest  Much larger global market  ROADMAP ______________    TOKEN DETAILS ______________   . Token name: Compass Token . Symbol: GNCT . Type: ERC20 (Ethereum Blockchain) . Total supply: 1,000,000,000 GNCT . Softcap: $500,000 USD . Hardcap: $14,000,000 USD . Token Sale: 29.01 - 30.04 . Accepted purchase:   BTC, BCH, DASH, ETH, LTC . Price: 1 GNCT = $0.14 - $0.30 USD . Country: Canada . Whitelist/KYC: KYC . Restricted areas: USA, China   TOKEN ALLOCATION ______________   . Token Sale   ||||||||||||||||||||   20% . Bonuses   ||||||||||   10% . Back Investor Funds   ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||   60% . Reserve   ||||||||||   10%  FUNDS DISTRIBUTION ______________    TOKEN SALE ______________   Sale of tokens are to raise funds for platform development.  . PHASE  Pre-Sale 1st  Round Pre-Sale 2nd Round Pre-Sale 3rd Round          Main-Sale           DURATION  29.01 - 04.02 05.02 - 11.02 12.02 - 28.02             09.04 - 30.04             PRICE  $0.14 USD $0.20 USD $0.25 USD       $0.30 USD        BONUS STRUCTURE  . For tokens Purchased      100,000 GNCT 200,000 GNCT 300,000 GNCT and above     Pre-Sale      10% 20% 30%     Main-Sale      05% 10% 20%  TEAM ______________   .   MICHAEL COLLINS CEO/FOUNDER Michael is a lending, financial technology specialist and serial entrepreneur. He is currently the owner of Great North Capital Inc. a financing company specializing in personal and small business loans. Michael has extensive knowledge of the Bitcoin and Ethereum platforms with a particular focus on blockchain technology and it potential in the financial   industry.   JEAN PIERRE RUKEBESHA CO-FOUNDER & CFO Jean Pierre is a CPA with a masters degree in business   administration.He specializes in accounting, managing businesses with analytics & strategic planning. He is also a two time author of business and entrepreneurial books.   JORDAN TYMBURSKI CTO Jordan is full stack computer engineer and has been working professionally in the industry for 7 years.He specializes in Java, C++, HTML/CSS/JS, PHP, SQL, Android SDK, Bootstrap, JQuery, ZMQ, Blackberry KNOX, GPG. Jordan is our senior engineer and will be incharge of the frontend architecture of GN Compass.  ADVISORS ______________   .  ANTOUN TOUBIA SENIOR ADVISOR GN COMPASS & CHAIRMAN, UNITED CAPITAL INVESTMENTS Antoun is an investment services professional with years of experience in Private Equity investments, venture capital and Blockchain Technology. He is currently building a new type of Private Equity Portfolio Fund based on the Blockchain technology and has already secured several project agreements including government backed contracts.  ROGER CROOK CEO OF CAPITAL SPRINGBOARD & FORMER CEO OF DHL GLOBAL FORWARDING Roger is the CEO of Capital Springboard - Singaporeâ€™s leading peer-to-peer invoice financing platform for SMEs. Capital Springboard facilitates trade for SMEs by granting them access to working capital provided by investors which include, accredited investors, institutional investors, HNWIs, IFAs and family offices.  DAVID DRAKE FOUNDER AND CHAIRMAN AT LDJ CAPITAL  David Drake is Founder and Chairman at LDJ Capital, a multi-family office which deals in various funds worldwide with over $1.5 trillion in assets, and maintains over 50+ global directors and family office partners. More recently, Mr. Drake is also seen as a leader in cryptocurrency. Mr. Drake saw the value of digital assets when everyone was avoiding it. .  BOBBY BARONE BLOCKCHAIN ADVISOR, INVESTOR & ENTHUSIAST Experienced blockchain advisor, investor & enthusiast with a demonstrated history of working in the financial services and blockchain industry. Deeply intrigued by disruptive business models. Angel Investor. Specialized in Ethereum & smart contract technology and their real-world applications. Skilled in business strategy, relations & development, ICO promotion, content creation, and white papers.  RIASAD HADI HOSSAIN BLOCKCHAIN CONSULTANT AND SOCIAL MEDIA EXPERT I work as a team member at Tradove.Inc alongside being an advisor for GN Compass. As an Advisor for GN Compass I will use my contact to bring in investors, help to grow and reach more and more people, get GN Compass listed on various websites, help with marketing and in the financial department, press releases etc.  GEOFFREY GREEN CEO OF MYNTEX INC  Myntex are the industry leaders in data and email encryption solutions. Myntex Inc .  GENE SWANK INVESTOR, BOARD MEMBER, ADVISER AND MENTOR Gene is a highly accomplished Senior Executive, C-Suite Officer, Founder, Serial Entrepreneur, Consultant, Thought Leader, Engineer and Board Member with over 15 years of success across wireless, software, technology, printing, real estate and more. Leveraging extensive experience in entrepreneurship and software development  JASON COLES BLOCKCHAIN/ICO ADVISOR, ICO CONSULTANT Jason is an innovator and industry leader with a proven track record of successful ICOâ€™s. Jason is a blockchain consultant and blockchain enthusiast.  BRYAN FEINBERG CEO AND FOUNDER OF ETHERALABS  Etheralabs is a NYC Based Blockchain Advisory. Bryan is a Licensed Investment Banker holding is Series 7, 63 & 79 Finra license and is both deeply passionate and active across both the fintech crypto landscape.  SUPPORTERS ______________   .  LEE RAJ ETHEREUM DEVELOPER AND BLOCKCHAIN CONSULTANT Lee develops Ethereum Smart Contracts using Solidity and offers Blockchain Consulting. Lee is also a developer with Nodejs (Express Framework), MongoDb, Javascript (Jquery) and HTML5 / CSS3 experience. .  SUBRAMANIAN VENKATESAN SOFTWARE ENGINEER, BLOCKCHAIN AND SMART CONTRACT SPECIALIST Subramanian Venkatesan is a Smart Contract Developer with strong CS fundamentals. Additional skills include creating Ethereum blockchain smart contracts using solidity. . He manages our social media marketing on all major social media platforms to promote our website, create brand awareness, brand promotion and lead generation.  .  SUNSHINE REYES MARKETING EXECUTIVE â€œMy previous Project Manager positions honed me to be patient, organized, attentive, emphatic, fastidious, and calm. It also taught me the useful knowledge that I still carry to this day. My expertise includes Social Media Engagement, Email Marketing, Business Directories, Canvas Designing, Data Entry, Data Minning, Organizing Files, and Email Managementâ€. .  GANESAN NAGALINGAM SENIOR DEVELOPER AND MARKETING EXECUTIVE â€œI am a PHP developer, experienced in PHP & MySQL web programming, clean W3 compliant XHTML/HTML/CSS coding and Javascript/AJAX programming. I also build custom database driven PHP cms websites and interactive web applications in PHP/MySQL. I also have experience in Social Media marketing/SEO/SMO/SEM in various companies as well as experience in #Digital Marketing, #SEO, #Wordpress #PHP #Web designing #Laravel Frame workâ€  PAYMENT PARTNERS ______________   STRATEGIC PARTNERS ______________                     POTENTIAL EXCHANGE LISTINGS ______________                               IN THE NEWS ______________                WE ARE LISTED ON ______________                                   BOUNTY CAMPAGIN ______________  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2708667.0  GN Compass is going to be a collaborative process. And we need support to make this ICO successful. So you win, I win. A team of skilled professionals has already dedicated a huge amount of their time and knowledge in order to make this happenâ€Šâ€”â€Šand we will continue to do so. Author: GN Compass
Title: [ANN - TOKEN SALE] GN Compass - Cryptocurrency-Backed Lending Platform
Body: There is 30% currently reserved for the pre-sale & ITO when you add the 10% that is going towards bonuses for participants! Also, the 60% that is used to back the loans on the platform are locked via smart contract and can only be distributed to members once a borrower defaults on a loan. Once a default is detected and grace period passes, the GNCT transfers directly to the lender automatically. What this means is that eventually, more & more GNCT will slowly move from the platform's reserves directly into the hands of the community! Only 10% of GNCT is actually reserved for the founding team, advisory board, and developers!
